version_description: ● Bug fixes and improvements

● “TRITON Best Selection” is newly available in the Expansion Sound Library (In-app purchase)
● Master tune - professional tuning range from 420 Hz to 460 Hz
● Now supports Pitch Bend and Modulation control
● Other minor bug fixes and improvements

● Universal support: Can be used with both iPads and iPhones.
● New expansion sound library ”80’s Electric Piano” (In-app purchase)
● New expansion sound library ”Mellow Tape Keyboard” (In-app purchase)
● Improvements to the settings page for assigning MIDI channel features, etc.
● Other enhancements to enhance overall use
● Enhancements to make Module easier to use.

- Expansion Sound Library 「SCARBEE - Classic EP-88M」 added*
- Expansion Sound Library 「KApro - Orchestral Dreams」 added*
- Expansion Sound Library 「KApro - Dreamy Synths」 added*
- Improved performance for the main unit.
- Improved unnatural sound cut-offs during playback.
- Numerous additional bug fixes and improvements.

* Available from in-app purchases.

・Expansion Sound Library "SYNTHOGY - Ivory Mobile American D" added*
・Added 2D mode to iPad.
・Now supports Super Retina Display such as iPhone XS.
・Bug fixes and improvements.

* Available from in-app purchases.

・Now supports New iPad Pro.
・PREMIER Vintage Organ has been discontinued.
・Other improvements and bug-fixes.

・Expansion Sound Library “KORG - Organ & Clav Collection” added*
・Bug fixes and improvements.

* Available from in-app purchases. This collection is available at no charge for all KORG Module PREMIER Vintage Organ customers.
- Content restoration for the previously discontinued “Premier Vintage Organ” is now possible. Limited to those who have already purchased “Premier Vintage Organ” only.

• Fixed a crash with Inter-App Audio and Audiobus.
• Other improvements and bug-fixes.

* This is the final version that will support 32bit devices and iOS 10. From the next version, only 64bit devices and iOS 11 or later will be supported.

- KORG Module has been renewed as KORG Module Pro. The UI color has been brushed up, and the sound browser is easier to use than ever.
- A new Expansion pack called "Module Performance Expansion". This includes the layer/split, MIDI CC# Learn, and a sound library that is crafted for layer/split that were high in demand. From band performances to song creation, the new features and sounds will make everything accelerated.
- Output signal level was adjusted to prevent distortion

• Now supports iOS13.
• Other improvements and bug-fixes.

• The integration with Gadget is sometimes failed. This has been fixed.
• Change the color scheme of the scale settings pane in 2D mode.
• Other improvements and bug-fixes.

- KApro Monumental Choir Dreams : A new choir library is available through the store page.
- Stability improvements.

- Hybrid digital synthesizer "Hybrid" module is added.
- "Hybrid Synth Pack 2" and "Cinematic" sound packs for Hybrid module are added.
- AUv3 is now supported. Now you can use Module in other iOS music production apps.
- The "Fairbanks" gadget is now available in conjunction with KORG Gadget 2.
- Added: a free trial feature for the Expansion Sound Libraries.
- Various other tweaks have been made to improve stability.
[Bugfix] New sound pack could not loaded in AUv3 mode. This has been fixed.

[new sound pack] Lo-Fi House sound pack is available through the store page.
[improvement] Addressing the battery drain issue in this version.

- A new expansion sound pack : 80s Dance Pop is available.
- Bug fix : User programs were not loaded correctly in the version 4.1.0. This has been fixed.
- Improvement : we changed the way to restore the in-app sound packs. To restore/download the items, please go to Store > Your items. You will see the list of the items you bought, and you can download the items. If you cannot see your items, please tap "Restore" to refresh the receipt information.
A New Sound Expansion Pack “Far North” is now available.
- "Synth Drum" : A New Sound Expansion Pack is available
- "Neo Soul" : A New Sound Expansion Pack is available
- "Melodic Techno" : A New Sound Expansion Pack is available.
